NCS: Medical and support information update
Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian")},
Thank you for filling in the medical and support information for {!Contact.FirstName}’s application for National Citizen Service (NCS).
You told us that {!Contact.FirstName} has anaemia. We will give this information to the staff who will be working with {!Contact.FirstName} during the programme. This is so they are aware of their condition. Please let {!Contact.FirstName} know that they must tell our staff if they are feeling unwell on the programme.
Part one of NCS is very active and {!Contact.FirstName} may be doing high energy physical activities for example rock climbing, canoeing and hiking with an overnight camp.
Please let us know if any high energy physical activities: may need adjusting for {!Contact.FirstName} to participate may have an impact on {!Contact.FirstName}’s condition are not suitable. Young people's health and safety is very important to us. If outdoor activity providers feel that it is unsafe for {!Contact.FirstName} to take part in activities, they may be asked to sit out.
If you’d like a full list of activities or more details, please get in touch with us using the contact details below.
NCS Inclusion Support Service - The Challenge
Phone: 0333 150 2425 Email: inclusion.support@the-challenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 10am - 6pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
